thumb.name: Scared Bear
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm sorry. Chris%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIs it safe to come out now?%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Under a Snake's Belly
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis is a snake's belly%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis is me%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm sorry. Fran.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: I Hope You Can Forgive Me
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERosalie.%3Cbr%3Enothing I say now%3Cbr%3Ecan take away all the hurt%3Cbr%3EI've caused you.%3Cbr%3Ebut I want you to know%3Cbr%3Ehow sorry I am%3Cbr%3Efor all I've put you through...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and how very important you are%3Cbr%3Ein my life and in my heart.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI Hope You%3Cbr%3ECan Somehow Forgive Me

thumb.name: Let's work things out.
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ELet's Find A Way. Chris Somehow things have gotten pretty complicated in our lives and I'm not quite sure how to make them right again. I just know that I want things to be the way they were.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EI love you and I don't want to lose you.%3Cbr%3E
